name: Cock Fight
description:
Play with your friends in this all out cock fight. You and up to 3 friends will decimate each other with a variety of different cocks wielding all sorts of firearms.

To play whoever your host is will start the game by pressing HOST and to join the host you will have to put in the host's IP address then press join.

You will unfortunately need to port forward your IP to the port 7777

This is currently a prototype so things will change and problems will be solved
